page.title: 13Pencombe-a rural population
page.content:
In our 12km sq block there is a population of 149. This works out at 12.4 people /sq.km. Of these 149, 49 are children and young people up to the age of 18 and another 16 are retired people, leaving 84 people of working age, not including 16-18 yr olds and from the survey on employment it is known that 72 of these are working either at full or part-time jobs.
The age of the population covers the whole range, being neither top heavy with many retired people, nor bottom heavy with many young families .
An interesting fact to emerge was that of the 100 adults, 51 or just over half originate from Herefordshire.
